39.1.hd_quote: The energy to provoke by refusing to confront obstacles.
39.1.behavioral_axis: Provokes by stepping back; the withdrawal itself is the test of spirit.
39.1.shadow_axis: Withdraws so much that no mutation can happen.

39.2.hd_quote: The instinctual and direct assault of obstacles.
39.2.behavioral_axis: Looks provocative even when quiet, so ends up having to meet it head-on.
39.2.shadow_axis: Avoids needed confrontation, feels picked on anyway.

39.3.hd_quote: The avoidance of confronting obstacles if failure puts others at risk.
39.3.behavioral_axis: Chooses which fights to pick because mutation affects everyone.
39.3.shadow_axis: Uses ‘others at risk’ to justify never provoking.

39.4.hd_quote: Careful evaluation and assessment before taking action.
39.4.behavioral_axis: Feels when it’s the right moment to poke the field.
39.4.shadow_axis: Over-thinks and never tests spirit, so mutation stalls.

39.5.hd_quote: The rare ability not to overcome but to bypass obstacles.
39.5.behavioral_axis: Because everyone expects provocation, they often don’t have to do it.
39.5.shadow_axis: Bypassing everything = no spirit gets tested.

39.6.hd_quote: The energy to provoke others by attempting to solve their problems.
39.6.behavioral_axis: Provokes because it sees the core problem and wants to correct it.
39.6.shadow_axis: Becomes domineering ‘I know what’s wrong with you.’
